original_title: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2014: Live Action
overview: Oscar nominated Live Action Shorts 2014: "Helium" (Director: Anders Walter, Denmark). "The Voorman Problem" (Director:  Mark Gill, UK). "Avant Que De Tout Perdre" (Director: Xavier Legrand, France). "Aquel No Era Yo" (Director: Esteban Crespo, Spain). "Pitääkö Mun Kaikki Hoitaa?" (Director: Selma Vilhunen, Finland).
title: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2014: Live Action
